title: Drug Prediction Based on Customers Review ðŸŽ‰
description: Used Google Colab and Python programming language to predict drugs based on customers review. Presented and published in 12th IEEE COMNESAT 2023 conference. Recognized as the best presenter in the conference.

title: Web Development for LA County - Internship
description: Learned more about REACT, Javascrip, SQL. Applied knowledge learned to create a simple website for LA county. The project also features a fully functional authentication process, which includes the login, registration, and forgot password page.

title: Convolutional Neural Networks and Transfer Learning
description: Used Keras library (Python) and applied the netwrok architecture to the EMNIST Letters data. Used transfer learning & fine-tuning in the Keras to apply the existing model to the new dataset.

title: Embedding and Recurrent Neural Networks
description: Used Keras library (Python) to create recurrent neural networks to predict the quality and difficulty scores that a student will assign given the student's comments.

title: Electric Car Traveler
description: Used Python and worked with two classmates to design and implement an algorithm related to weighted undirected graphs.

title: Small World
description: This project was implemented using Python Programming language. In this project, the player is playing against the AI. This project was implemented using adversarial search with the MinMax and alpha-beta pruning algorithm.

title: HealthApp
description: This application was designed for iOS users using Swift programming language. The app contains four tabs, and each tab functions separately. The app is available in both English and Spanish language.

title: Game of Nim
description: This project was implemented using Python Programming language. In this project, the player is playing against the AI. This project was implemented using adversarial search with the MinMax and alpha-beta pruning algorithm.
